narrative.title: Xiii Corps - 1941Q4
narrative.situation: British Infantry Corps deployed in North Africa during 1941Q4.
narrative.objectives: Infantry corps for breakthrough and exploitation operations in desert warfare. Primary mission in Crusader: contain Axis frontier garrisons, support XXX Corps armored operations, relieve Tobruk.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Western Desert Libya - escarpments, gravel plains, wadis, coastal zone

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Siege warfare and assault operations (Tobruk relief)
